page.title: 03TRANSPORT
page.content: CARS ARE A POPULAR FORM OF TRANSPORT. THOSE WHO DONT HAVE A CAR EITHER WALK TO THEIR DESTINATION OR TAKE THE BUS. THERE IS A WIDE RANGE OF BUSES TO CHOOSE FROM.THE ELECTRIC TRAIN IS A POPULAR ALTERNATIVE WHICH HAS MANY CONNECTIONS THROUGHOUT THE AREA. A NEW MOTORWAY HAS BEEN BUILT WHICH CUTS THROUGH THE CITY CENTRE TO CATER FOR THE RAPID INCREASE IN THE NUMBER OF CARS. THE UNDERGROUND SYSTEM RUNS ON A CIRCULAR TRACK,CARRYING PASSENGERS BETWEEN THE SOUTH OF THE RIVER AND THE NORTH.THIS WAS RECENTLY MODERNISED WITH NEW ROLLING STOCK AND AN UPRATING OF THE STATIONS.RIVER TRANSPORT IS VIRTUALLY NON EXISTENT SINCE THE FERRIES WERE RECENTLY SCRAPPED.
